about_the_game:
Casual Co-Op Fun


Explore both randomly-generated and pre-made maps as you progress through rounds of increasing difficulty. Dominate with weapons and power-ups to beat off massive zombie hordes, and compete amongst your friends for money, items, and bragging rights.

Cooperation is encouraged, but be careful of stray bullets and bouncing grenades!

Why Should You Play Box Zombies?

  • Fun Local Co-Op / Party Game
  • Casual "Turn Your Brain Off and Enjoy" Gameplay
  • Simple Controls, Endless Replayability

Features:

  • 19+ Characters to Unlock
  • 11+ Weapons
  • 8+ Maps
  • Infinite Randomly Generated Maps
  • Day & Night Gamemodes
  • Singleplayer & Co-Operative Action
  • Easy to Learn, Hard to Master
  • Timeless, Classic Gameplay
  • Gigantic Zombie Hordes
  • Strong Emphasis on Teamwork
  • Great for Parties

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: Is there online co-op?
A: Not yet, but if the community expresses significant interest for online co-op, it could be made a priority.

Q: Is this the equivalent product as the mobile app with the same name?
A: Well, yes and no. It is the same game, but your stats will not carry over. The mobile game was the initial build, but the online play was incredibly buggy. This version is almost entirely re-written, which resulted in a more stable experience, but essentially an entirely different product than the mobile version.

A Note from the Solo Developer:

Hey everyone!

Thanks for considering Box Zombies. This game is a spiritual successor to a game I have very fond memories of as a kid, and I hope Box Zombies will bring you the same enjoyment I had.

This is my passion project, and it has been quite the learning experience. I love reading your feedback and seeing what ideas you have, so please reach out to me if anything comes to mind or if you encounter any bugs.

Thanks For Playing!
